Budget App

Preview Github

The budget app allows us to enter our income and expenses daily and then calculate in percentage how much money we have spent.

Course Goals

Preview Github

Course Goals app allows us to monitor our progress in learning.

Expense Tracker

Preview Github

Expense tracker app allows us to monitor our expenses by day, month, and year.

Pig game

Preview Github

Pig game app is a simple dice game with two players. The goal of a game is to be the first player with 100 points. Players roll dice as many times as they wish, adding all roll results to a running total. But if the player rolls a 1 loses the current score (the total score remains), and the game switches to another player.

To do list

Preview Github

ToDo List app is an app that we use to maintain our day-to-day tasks. The most important tasks are on top of the list. The less important ones are at the bottom.

Guess my number

Preview Github

Guess my number app is a game of guessing one number between 1 and 20. The app picks up one random number, and the player needs to guess which number is the secret one. At the start of the game, the player has a score of 20. Every time that he makes a mistake, the score decreases by 1.

Modal

Preview Github

The Modal plugin is a dialog box/popup window that is displayed on top of the current page, with the open and close function.

Responsive Website

Preview Github

Bootstrap4 Full Responsive Web Site is a simulation of using this technology on a home page and is completely responsive for all devices.

Portfolio Web page

Preview Github

Portfolio Web page is a simulation of using SCSS as a preprocessor which allows us better workflows for maintaining our stylesheets and reduces the number of times of repeating ourselves.
